products.name: Glitter Nail Art Kit
products.description: A set containing various colored glitters and tools to create sparkly and glamorous nail art designs.

products.name: 3D Nail Art Set
products.description: A collection of 3D embellishments such as flowers, bows, and beads for adding dimension to your nails.

products.name: Floral Nail Art Kit
products.description: A kit with floral designs and tools to create intricate, nature-inspired nail art.

products.name: Gems & Stones Nail Art Kit
products.description: A set of colorful gems, rhinestones, and small stones to decorate nails and create a glamorous, jeweled look.

products.name: French Tip Nail Art Kit
products.description: A kit with all the tools and stickers needed to create classic French tip nails with precision.

products.name: Floral Stamping Plate
products.description: A stamping plate with delicate floral patterns for creating elegant, floral nail designs.

products.name: Geometric Nail Stamps
products.description: A stamping plate featuring geometric patterns such as stripes, squares, and triangles for bold designs.

products.name: Animal Print Stencil Set
products.description: A set of stencils with various animal print designs like leopard, zebra, and snake for a wild look.

products.name: Vintage Nail Stamps
products.description: A set of vintage-inspired stamps with designs like lace, swirls, and Victorian motifs.

products.name: Starry Sky Stamping Set
products.description: A stamping plate with star and moon designs to create celestial-inspired nail art.

products.name: Metallic Nail Stickers
products.description: Stickers in metallic finishes such as gold and silver to create stylish and eye-catching designs.

products.name: Animal Print Nail Decals
products.description: Nail decals with various animal print designs, perfect for a bold, wild look.

products.name: Water Transfer Nail Stickers
products.description: Stickers that transfer effortlessly onto nails when dipped in water, with designs ranging from flowers to abstract art.

products.name: Abstract Nail Decals
products.description: A set of nail decals featuring abstract patterns and artistic designs.

products.name: Flower Nail Stickers
products.description: Cute and colorful flower-themed stickers for adding a floral touch to your nails.

products.name: Detail Nail Art Brush Set
products.description: A set of fine-tipped brushes for creating intricate and detailed nail art designs.

products.name: Dotting Tool Kit
products.description: A kit with various-sized dotting tools for creating dots, flowers, and patterns on nails.

products.name: Striper Brush Set
products.description: A set of long, thin brushes for creating thin stripes and lines for detailed nail art.

products.name: Fan Brush for Nail Art
products.description: A fan-shaped brush for creating texture effects like gradient or feathered nail art.

products.name: Fan Nail Art Stencil
products.description: A stencil tool for creating artistic fan-like patterns on nails.

products.name: Holographic Nail Foil
products.description: A holographic nail foil that gives a dazzling, multi-dimensional shine to nails.

products.name: Mirror Chrome Powder
products.description: A chrome powder for creating a mirror-like shine on nails with a futuristic effect.

products.name: Gold Foil for Nails
products.description: A set of gold leaf foils for adding a luxurious gold finish to your nails.

products.name: Silver Chrome Powder
products.description: A silver chrome powder that gives nails a sleek, metallic shine.

products.name: Rainbow Nail Foil
products.description: A rainbow-colored foil for creating vibrant, multi-colored effects on your nails.
